contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 12, 1903 D Pentre Contest
Pentre Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
pentre-contest
None
Prince and Peasant
Ynys Field, Ton, Pentre Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £1. March contest - 1st (£1.1s.) divided between Lewis Merthyr and Great Western. Best cornet and euphonium - Great Western. Best trombone "for doing least mischief" - (adjudicators remarks) - Lewis Merthyr. 8 bands competed.
Aug. 11, 2016, 6:17 a.m. Aug. 17, 2018, 9:48 a.m.
1 Great Western Colliery Silver J. H. Roberts
2 Plymouth Workmens J. H. Roberts
3 Lewis Merthyr Band Robert Dawson
4 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band T. Eastwood
4 Caerphilly Carl Taylor
Unknown Result Abergwynfi George Dimmock
Unknown Result Tylorstown Unknown
Unknown Result Cwmparc Samuel Radcliffe
